ThingDef.label: purple nebula dragon
ThingDef.description: A purple nebula dragon. The key distinctive feature of nebula dragon is its strange energy "mane" usually found on its back that, when in flying through space, this mane engulfs dragons entire body and gives a look of a comet while also allowing them to travel at much higher speed.\n\n They arent as aggressive as usual dragons due to their space faring nature but when hungry, they will kill anything that comes into contact. Also unlike regular dragons, nebula dragon spit causes burns but without actually igniting the area on fire. Additionally every now and then it sheds strange dust.

ThingDef.label: blue nebula dragon
ThingDef.description: A blue nebula dragon. The key distinctive feature of nebula dragon is its strange energy "mane" usually found on its back that, when in flying through space, this mane engulfs dragons entire body and gives a look of a comet while also allowing them to travel at much higher speed.\n\n They arent as aggressive as usual dragons due to their space faring nature but when hungry, they will kill anything that comes into contact. Also unlike regular dragons, nebula dragon spit causes burns but without actually igniting the area on fire. Additionally every now and then it sheds strange dust.

ThingDef.label: red nebula dragon
ThingDef.description: A bright red nebula dragon. The key distinctive feature of nebula dragon is its strange energy "mane" usually found on its back that, when in flying through space, this mane engulfs dragons entire body and gives a look of a comet while also allowing them to travel at much higher speed.\n\n They arent as aggressive as usual dragons due to their space faring nature but when hungry, they will kill anything that comes into contact. Also unlike regular dragons, nebula dragon spit causes burns but without actually igniting the area on fire. Additionally every now and then it sheds strange dust.

ThingDef.label: void dragon
ThingDef.description: Void dragons are the enigmas of space faring creatures. Grown inside black holes they are capable of destroying entire star system should hunger arrive. It is unknown how they even came to be but one thing is sure, whatever you do, do NOT provoke a void dragon.\n\nThe only currently known un-runed void dragon. Its body is part wyrm, part wywern. Its is very aggressive and has very powerful breath attack. Like all void dragons, it sheds abyssal pearls from time to time.

ThingDef.label: destroyer dragon
ThingDef.description: Void dragons are the enigmas of space faring creatures. Grown inside black holes they are capable of destroying entire star system should hunger arrive. It is unknown how they even came to be but one thing is sure, whatever you do, do NOT provoke a void dragon. Occasionally they shed strange crystals.

ThingDef.label: world eater dragon
ThingDef.description: Void dragons are the enigmas of space faring creatures. Grown inside black holes they are capable of destroying entire star system should hunger arrive. It is unknown how they even came to be but one thing is sure, whatever you do, do NOT provoke a void dragon. Occasionally they shed strange crystals.

ThingDef.label: harbinger dragon
ThingDef.description: Void dragons are the enigmas of space faring creatures. Grown inside black holes they are capable of destroying entire star system should hunger arrive. It is unknown how they even came to be but one thing is sure, whatever you do, do NOT provoke a void dragon.\n\nHarbinger dragon is a regular dragon that was corrupted by massive amounts of dark energy and turned into a void dragon. Its far more aggressive and instead of breathing fire it spits dark energy that explodes upon contact. Like all void dragons, it sheds strange crystals known as abyssal pearls.

ThingDef.label: rurelion zol
ThingDef.description: A rather peculiar space dragon. Rurelion Zol is highly intelligent, creative and very arrogant dragon capable of speech. Apparently it is the reason why stars exist as it among its kin are the creators of the universe. \n\nStrangely enough despite all that it is rather docile for a dragon due to a simple desire to have a conversation about how great it is. Also note: do not mention words Bargon or Rantheon if you value your life. Do not ask for why.
